features: 【Fast charging】The high-quality four-core iPhone copper wire improves the charging and data transmission speed of the iPhone charging cable. Our iPhone charger technology ensures faster charging times while ensuring that your device is completely safe.

【MFi Certified Lightning Cable】For your lightning devices. Built with original chip promise NO WARNING MESSAGE pops up, ensures that your lightning devices are loaded and charge safely and faster at maximum speed.

【Nylon braided】With the help of nylon insulation braided by the iPhone charger cable and precision welded connectors, the iPhone cable is more durable, stronger, and softer than normal iPhone charger cables, without tangling. Withstand all kinds of daily connection needs and long-term use.

【Massive compatibility】iPhone Charger Cable for iPhone 12Pro Max/12Pro/12/iphone xr /iphone xs / xs max /iphone x/ iphone 10/ iphone 11/iphone11 pro/iphone 11 pro Max, iPhone 8 / 8 Plus, iPhone 7 / 7 Plus, iPhone 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6, iPhone 5s / 5c / 5 / SE and more.

【You will get】3 iPhone charging cables of the same length are all 10FT, suitable for different occasions, so the iPhone charger cable is long enough to easily charge the device in the bedroom, sofa, office and travel, even if you The same is true of sitting in the back seat of a car.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made of high-quality materials Superior craftsmanship is mainly the use of superior materials. This charging cable uses high-purity and thicker copper wire, which makes the transmission and charging more stable. For iPhones, stable charging is very beneficial to battery life. Fast charging and transferring data To reduce cable resistance and increase charging speed, high-quality four-core copper wire is used internally, so in most cases, your device can charge at 2.4 amps and transfer files at 480Mbps. Sturdy and wear-resistant This charging cable is covered with nylon braided fiber material, which makes it stronger and more durable. Not easily damaged when pulled, folded, bent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and durable!
reviews.reviewText: iPhone chargers that came with my phone have been damaged and stopped working. Was working for a reliable replacement and found this one. It is a terrific product. The charger is extremely durable as it still lasts to this day and I purchased this product a while ago. The extended length makes charging my phone extremely convenient and it charges very fast. Would definitely recommend to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The "Infinite Energizer" Charging Cable – A Wild Ride for Your Phone!
reviews.reviewText: Oh boy, where do I begin with this electrifying product? Let me tell you, this iPhone charging cable is more than just a regular cable; it's like a rollercoaster ride for your phone! Strap in, folks, because we're about to embark on a hilarious journey together!First off, let's talk about the length of this magical cord. It's so long that I could practically use it to jump rope with my pet giraffe. Seriously, I've never seen a cable this long before! It's perfect for those moments when you want to charge your phone in one room and still be able to scroll through memes in another.But wait, there's more! The cable also doubles as a fidget toy. You can twist it, turn it, and even use it to practice your juggling skills. It's like having your own personal circus act right in your pocket! Just be careful not to get too carried away; I may or may not have accidentally knocked over a lamp while attempting an impressive cable-twirling maneuver.Now, let's talk about its superpower – the ability to disappear into thin air! Yes, you heard that right. This charging cable has an uncanny ability to disappear at the most inconvenient moments. It's like it's acquired its own mind and decided to play hide-and-seek with me. I've found it in the laundry basket, inside the fridge, and even tangled up with my socks. It's truly a master of disguise!Despite all its quirks and shenanigans, this charging cable does the one thing it's supposed to do: charge my iPhone. It works like a charm, providing power to my phone faster than a caffeinated cheetah. So, while it may be mischievous and unpredictable, it gets the job done.In conclusion, if you're looking for an iPhone charging cable that will keep you on your toes and add some excitement to your daily charging routine, the "Infinite Energizer" is the way to go. Just be prepared for unexpected adventures, and always keep your eyes peeled for its latest magic tricks. Trust me, it'll make charging your phone a laugh riot!Disclaimer: I am not responsible for any lamps knocked over or moments of confusion caused by this mischievous charging cable. Use at your own risk, and remember to have a sense of humor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a set of charging cables, and I must say, they have completely revolutionized my charging experience. These cables have exceeded my expectations in every possible way, and I am thrilled to give them a resounding five-star review. The durability of these charging cables is exceptional. I have gone through countless cables in the past that were flimsy, prone to fraying, or simply stopped working after a short period of use. However, these cables are made of high-quality materials that feel robust and built to last. They can withstand the daily wear and tear of regular use without any issues, and I am confident they will serve me well for a long time. The charging speed provided by these cables is outstanding. They efficiently transfer power to my devices, ensuring a quick and reliable charging experience. I no longer have to wait for extended periods to replenish my device's battery life, which has been a game-changer, especially when I'm on the go or in a hurry. I appreciate the manufacturers' attention to detail in designing cables that prioritize both speed and safety. I also want to highlight the tangle-free design of these cables. They have a sturdy construction that minimizes tangling, making it a breeze to organize and store them. No more frustrating knots or untangling sessions before I can charge my devices. This simple yet thoughtful design feature has made my charging routine significantly more convenient. Lastly, the value for money offered by these charging cables is exceptional. Considering their superior build quality, impressive charging speed, and overall reliability, the price I paid for this set was truly worth every penny. I believe investing in reliable charging cables is a smart decision to protect my devices and ensure efficient charging, and these cables have proven to be an excellent investment. These charging cables have completely surpassed my expectations. Their durability, charging speed, tangle-free design, and value for money have made them an indispensable part of my daily life. I highly recommend these cables to anyone seeking a reliable, efficient, and hassle-free charging experience. They deserve a resounding five-star rating, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

reviews.reviewText: Very long and worked well for a little bit. They have just recently bit the dust and stopped working but they lasted for a long while

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Pack
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased these type of cords a few times from amazon. I love the fact that I have several so that when one decides to finally quit working, I have an extra one to replace it on hand. No cord will last forever not even the Apple original. These are nice and long to reach from far away and I'm fine with the reasonable pricing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t last long.
reviews.reviewText: These cords were great, but they didn’t all last very long. Some of them were quickly glitchy and didn’t allow charge our phones during the night. At first we just needed to make sure that the cord and phone was in just the right position, but eventually it barely worked at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with these chargers. They charged quickly. The cord is thick so doesn’t break easily nor does it get tangled and the length is extra long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that fact that I purchased this in April of last year (2023) & it still has lasted me this long. Its length is very convenient and that fact that I still have one that is brand new not used yet just goes to show that they last longer than other chargers. ( I have one in my room that I use & another in my work bag). I’m always nervous about purchasing chargers online but I definitely have recommended this pack & will be back to reorder in the future.
These are sturdier than other chargers I’ve tried. The length of the cord is great.
